titleStmt.title: Donne's satyr containing 1. a short map of mundane vanity, 2. a cabinet of merry conceits, 3. certain pleasant propositions and questions with their merry solutions and answers : being very useful, pleasant and delightful to all, and offensive to none / by Jo. Donne.
titleStmt.author: Donne, John, 1604-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for M. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
